page.title: 07HEALTH A DOCTOR PART 2
page.content: {During a surgery}there is one doctor, two receptionists and a nurse present. {The main form of pill or medicine {prescribed}is penicillin and other antibiotics.The new government list creates alot of problems for doctors and Doctor Gay does not honestly think that it helps any of his patients.He said,"Its a question of the omissions and the way in which many of the things that are so called brand names we can not prescribe.We now use a longer name which is no help to to the patients.There isn't one day that goes by that the new list does not create a problem."
